name: Slow down (MarvelousBilly)
description:
Slow Down is a game made for Mini Jam #60, theme of "Crime" and limitation "Pausing must be a core mechanic"

In Slow Down, you are a thrill seeker who wants to experience an adrenaline rush, and to do so? Drive close to buildings or objects without crashing. The longer you are near objects, a point count builds up. To receive your points you have to retreat from the object or building without crashing. If you do crash, the streak is broken and you get 0 points. Luckily for you (and your car) you can slow time down--but there's a limit! The cool down in the bottom left is how much you can slow down. While it does slowly fill up, you can also have a streak of 100+ points to recharge significantly faster.
